segments.text: The kitchen is bright and sunny from the window, and yet there's an impending sense of danger in the air.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the woman, seemingly tranquil, her dress and apron creating the perfect domestic image.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the water is overflowing, and the danger lurks at her feet, just waiting to catch her off guard.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Part of me wants to shake her and point out the chaos, but would she even listen?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I glance over at the boy again, balancing on the stool, and I feel a rush of anger at how risky this whole situation is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The contrast between the calm garden outside and this chaotic kitchen is striking, yet nobody seems to care.
segments.speaker: PAR
